title: Senior Release Engineer
description:
Come work at a place where innovation and teamwork come together to support the most exciting missions in the world!
   

  

 Job Description: Sr. Release and DevOps Engineer
   

  

**Brief Description**
 As a
 **Senior Release \\& DevOps Engineer** 
 , you will play a key role in designing, implementing, and managing CI/CD pipelines for enterprise SaaS platforms such as Salesforce, NetSuite, Workday, and Dell Boomi. You will be responsible for ensuring smooth, secure, and automated release processes across multiple environments while collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to deliver high\\-quality releases with speed and reliability.
   

  

**Full Job Description**
 As a
 **Senior Release \\& DevOps Engineer** 
 , you will lead the setup, maintenance, and optimization of our enterprise release processes across multiple Business applications (SaaS systems). This includes defining CI/CD best practices, managing build and deployment pipelines, automating operational workflows, and ensuring robust governance for release management.
   

  

 You will work closely with application, QA, and infrastructure teams to drive continuous integration, delivery, and deployment strategies. The ideal candidate should have prior hands\\-on experience with Salesforce DevOps and deep expertise in automation tools such as Jenkins, Docker, and AWS.
   

  

 This position is based in our
 **Pune, India office** 
 , and the candidate should be open to working from the office as per company policy.
   

  

**Primary Skills:**
* Strong experience with Salesforce CI/CD, including tools such as Git, Salesforce CLI (sf/sfdx), Opsera, or Jenkins. Proficient with SF metadata APIs.
* Proficiency in Jenkins – pipeline configuration, Groovy scripting, job orchestration, and integration with Salesforce, Bitbucket and Jira cloud services.
* Basic understanding with Docker, container orchestration, and environment provisioning.
* Expert in shell scripting (Bash, Linux) and familiarity with Python or Groovy for automation.
* Exposure to AWS Cloud Services (EC2, S3, IAM, Lambda, CodePipeline, etc.) for deployment and infrastructure automation.
* Knowledge of SaaS system release processes (Salesforce, NetSuite, Workday, Dell Boomi).
* Version control management using Git/Bitbucket and branching strategies for multi\\-environment deployments.
* Strong understanding of DevOps principles, CI/CD pipelines, and release management best practices.
* Solid knowledge of build and release governance, including rollback, change management, and approval workflows.
* Excellent troubleshooting and problem\\-solving skills across distributed systems and cloud environments.


**Nice to Have:**
* AWS Certification (Developer or DevOps Engineer – Associate/Professional).
* Experience with Kubernetes, Helm, or container orchestration tools.
* Exposure to monitoring and observability tools (e.g., CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK).
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum practices and Jira automation.
* Experience integrating CI/CD with test automation tools for regression and performance validation.
* Basic understanding of data migration and integration workflows between CRM and ERP systems.
* Experience with code quality, security scanning, and compliance tools (e.g., SonarQube, Checkmarx, or OWASP).


**Soft Skills \\& Non\\-Technical Qualities**
* Passion for quality, accuracy, efficiency
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Good interpersonal skills
* Good time management skills
* Ability to multi\\-task and prioritize
* Strong problem\\-solving abilities

 Manager, Software Development
   

  

**Overview:**
 As a Senior Software Engineer I in a product development organization, you will be part of the team that designs and develops cloud applications in the Data Quality domain. You will collaborate with architects, product managers, and other software developers for developing product features. You are expected to be hands\\-on in Java and up to date with the latest development technologies such as REST API and Cloud Applications.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
 As a Senior Software Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in the development and enhancement of our software products.
   

  

**Your responsibilities will include:**
* Contributing to development of the codebase, focusing on key functionalities of the application.
* Collaborating with technical staff to troubleshoot software issues independently, incorporating suggestions for enhancements and improvements.
* Engaging in the design phase of applications, ensuring robust and scalable architectures.

title: Foreseer AI- Lead
description:
**About The Role**
**Grade Level (for internal use):**
 11
   

  

**The** 
**Role:** 
 Foreseer AI – Lead
   

  

**The Team:** 
 The Foreseer team delivers digital transformation solutions at SPGMI for information extraction from structures and semi structured documents and websites. Foreseer is a human in the loop platform that combines latest AI/ML advances with a state of the art UI for delivering multiple projects, all powered by a core distributed, cloud native, auto scalable framework. Team comprises of experts in Java and Python language and ML engineers.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Support and foster a quality\\-first, agile culture that is built on partnership, trust and sharing
* Design, develop and maintain functionalities to create new solutions on the platform.
* Learning and understanding all aspects of the framework and the project deliverables.
* Be technically deep and provide input on architecture, design and code.
* Be responsible for driving technical design, architecture and implementation of new features and iterations of your project.
* Collaborate closely with business and PM stakeholders in roadmap planning and implementation efforts and ensure technical milestones align with business requirements.
* Implement security measures and compliance standards to protect sensitive data and ensure adherence to industry regulations.
* Maintain comprehensive documentation of platform, processes and procedures for reference and knowledge sharing.
* Ensure the use of standards, governance and best practices in the industry to deliver high quality scalable solutions.
* Ability to adapt communication styles to various audiences, from engineers to business stakeholders and executive leadership.
* Strategic thinker and influencer with demonstrated technical and business acumen and problem\\-solving skills.


**Experience \\& Qualifications**
* BS or MS degree in Computer Science or Information Technology or equivalent
* 7\\+ years hands on experience with Java, J2EE and related frameworks and technologies (Spring, Restful services, Spring Boot, Spring JPA, Spring Security, MVC etc.).
* 3\\+ years of experience with designing, architecting and building microservices based distributed systems in serverless environment (containers platforms).
* 3\\+ years of experience in Active MQ, distributed streaming platform or other related JMS providers.
* 1\\+ years of experience in leading global teams in an agile environment.
* Proficient with Data structures and Algorithms.
* Experience with Performance tuning, Thread dump analysis and code refactoring.
* Experience in different data base technologies (like RDBMS, NOSQL)
* Experience in Containerization, cloud platforms, CI/CD, and deployments through CI/CD pipelines, and AWS services like S3, EKS, EC2 etc.
* Proficiency in the development environment, including IDE, web \\& application server, GIT, Azure DevOps, unit\\-testing tool and defect management tools


**Nice To Have Skills**
* Distributed systems programming.
* AI/ML solutions architecture.
* Knowledge of GenAI Platforms and tech stacks.
* Hands on experience with Elastic/Redis search.
* Hands on experience in Python
* Hands on experience in Vaadin Framework.
* Experience in Agile and Scrum methodologies


**What’s In It For** 
**You?**
**Our Mission**
 Advancing Essential Intelligence.
   

  

**Our People**
 We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide—so we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We’re committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference.
   

  

**Our Values**
**Integrity, Discovery, Partnership**
 Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of integrity in all we do, bring a spirit of discovery to our work, and collaborate in close partnership with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals.
   

  

**Benefits**

**Our Benefits Include**
* Health \\& Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
* Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
* Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.

 At S\\&P Global, we are committed to fostering a connected and engaged workplace where all individuals have access to opportunities based on their skills, experience, and contributions. Our hiring practices emphasize fairness, transparency, and merit, ensuring that we attract and retain top talent. By valuing different perspectives and promoting a culture of respect and collaboration, we drive innovation and power global markets.

 If you receive an email from a spglobalind.com domain or any other regionally based domains, it is a scam and should be reported to reportfraud@spglobal.com. S\\&P Global never requires any candidate to pay money for job applications, interviews, offer letters, “pre\\-employment training” or for equipment/delivery of equipment. Stay informed and protect yourself from recruitment fraud by reviewing our guidelines, fraudulent domains, and how to report suspicious activity here.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 S\\&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. title: Sr.System Development Engineer, AGI Infrastructure
job_function: Quality Assurance, Information Technology, and Engineering
description:
**Description**
 The Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) team is looking for a passionate, talented, and inventive engineers to play a pivotal role in the development/maintenance of industry\\-leading multi\\-modal and multi\\-lingual large language models (LLM). AGI team's mission is to leverage our hyper\\-scalable, general\\-purpose large model training and inference systems to develop and deploy cutting\\-edge sensory AI foundational models that revolutionize machine perception, interpretation and interaction, with humans and with the physical world.
   

  

 We believe in “Work Hard. Have Fun. Make History” value by having a strong focus on sharing learning experiences from the front line with the development teams. So, the options for people in the team are vast. If you like mastering a domain and going deep, we need you. If you can juggle three tasks and coordinate with multiple people in the heat of an incident, we need you. If you love the benefits of process and methodical improvement, you will love it here. If you want to keep your head down, headphones on, and bash out code to support the team, we have a spot for you too.
   

  

 You will be required to deeply understand technology landscapes, and evaluate the use of new technologies. You will be influential within your team and work with peers and senior leaders to define and revise the standards for operational excellence across systems. You will consistently tackle abstract issues that span multiple functional areas and drive your team to push for improvements that can scale across other teams, services, and platforms.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 Lead design, automation and improve GenAI training compute infrastructure continuously.
   

  

 Guide/Mentor other engineers as force\\-multiplier to deliver results
   

  

 Participate in design and code reviews and identify bottlenecks.
   

  

 Identify performance bottlenecks in compute infrastructure and propose solutions to address them.
   

  

 Candidates should be well\\-versed in core AWS services, including EC2 , Lambda , EKS etc.
   

  

 Experienced in setting up and managing CI/CD pipelines using tools such as AWS CodePipeline, GitHub Actions, or similar platforms.
   

  

 Familiarity with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like AWS CloudFormation, Terraform, or the AWS CDK is a valuable asset. Furthermore, an understanding of networking concepts like VPC, subnets, and security groups, as well as configuring Load Balancers and Route 53, is desirable.
   

  

 Should have hands\\-on experience in Kubernetes.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* 6\\+ years of systems design, software development, operations, automation, and process improvement experience
* Experience programming with at least one modern language such as Python, Ruby, Golang, Java, C\\+\\+, C\\#, Rust
* Experience with Linux/Unix
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines build processes


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with distributed systems at scale


 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how\\-we\\-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.

 \\- ADCI \\- Tamil Nadu

description:

**(\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' client \\- Enver)
   

  

**What do you need for this opportunity?
   

  

**Must have skills required:**
 C\\# and Object Oriented Programming, PLAYFAB, Meta quest Developmen, Photon Pun, Unity 3D (VR Experience)
   

  

**Enver is Looking for:******
**Role : Senior Unity Developer**
**About Us:** 
 Enver Studio is a leading VR game development. We are passionate about pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in virtual reality and crafting unforgettable gaming adventures.
   

  

**Position Overview:** 
 We are seeking a Senior Unity Developer who is scrappy, quick to learn, and driven by a passion for developing cutting\\-edge games. The ideal candidate will thrive in a fast\\-paced environment, demonstrate strong problem\\-solving skills, and have experience with both multiplayer games and VR development. If you're excited about working hard and building the most popular applications in VR, we want to hear from you!
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Develop and implement complex gameplay systems and mechanics in Unity.
* Design and optimize multiplayer game systems using Photon PUN.
* Develop systems to work with Backend Player Data Service PLAYFAB
* Work with VR technologies, specifically Oculus Quest 2 and Unity XR Toolkit, to create immersive experiences.
* Collaborate effectively with designers, artists, and other developers in a team environment.
* Utilize version control systems (GitHub) for source code management.
* Understand and contribute to the entire pipeline from 3D asset integration to final development.


**Requirements:**
* Proven experience with multiplayer game development using Photon PUN. \\- REQUIREMENT
* Hands\\-on experience with VR development, particularly with Oculus Quest 2 and Unity XR Toolkit. If you lack specific VR experience, you must be an exceptionally strong developer with a willingness to quickly master VR concepts \\- REQUIREMENT
* Experience with PLAYFAB. \\- NOT REQUIRED BUT IDEAL
* Strong understanding of Unity's core systems and APIs.
* Experience in developing and implementing complex systems and gameplay mechanics.
* Deep understanding of C\\# and Object Oriented Programming
* Ability to quickly adapt, learn, and solve problems effectively.
* Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in a team setting with designers, artists, and other developers.
* Proficiency with version control systems, specifically GitHub.
* Understanding of the full development pipeline, from 3D asset creation to game development.


 ﻿
   

  

**What We Offer:**
* Competitive salary with bonus opportunities based on performance
* The opportunity to work on leading VR projects with a talented team.
* Flexible working hours
* Remote work.

title: Lead II - Enterprise Solutions (Senior Salesforce Experience Cloud Developer)
description:
**Role Description**
**Job Title: Senior Salesforce Experience Cloud Developer**
**Experience Range : 5 to 8\\+ years**
**Hiring Location:** 
 Bangalore, Hyderabad, Pune, Noida, Kochi and Trivandrum
   

  

**Role Overview**
 We are seeking a
 **Senior Salesforce Experience Cloud Developer** 
 to lead the design and implementation of scalable, secure, and content\\-rich digital experiences leveraging Experience Cloud and Sales Cloud. This role is perfect for professionals passionate about community portals, digital ecosystems, and delivering solutions aligned with Salesforce best practices and ESG/regulatory standards.
   

  

**Experience Requirements**
* 5–8\\+ years of Salesforce development experience with significant involvement in Experience Cloud and Sales Cloud projects.
* Proven track record of developing community portals and CMS\\-driven experiences.
* Strong experience with Salesforce integrations.
* Demonstrated ability to mentor junior developers, conduct code reviews, and work effectively in agile delivery environments.


**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and build branded, responsive Experience Cloud sites using Lightning Web Components (LWC), Lightning Web Runtime (LWR), and Flows.
* Integrate Experience Cloud with Sales Cloud for seamless lead management, partner engagement, and case workflow automation.
* Implement and manage Salesforce CMS, including CMS Collections and personalized content delivery.
* Ensure UI consistency by adhering to the Salesforce Lightning Design System (SLDS) guidelines.
* Develop reusable and modular components contributing to internal libraries for triggers, integrations, and exception handling.
* Implement security features including SSO, MFA, and secure sharing models aligned with governance, accessibility, and ESG compliance.
* Lead code reviews, mentor junior developers, and collaborate with architects, analysts, and designers.
* Use CI/CD tools like GitHub and project tracking tools such as JIRA.
* Ensure mobile responsiveness and accessibility compliance in all user interfaces.


**Top Skills \\& Expertise**
* Experience Cloud \\& LWC/LWR: Branded site development, user access management, content personalization, and performance tuning.
* Sales Cloud: Deep understanding of standard/custom objects, flows, and lead management.
* CMS \\& UX Design: Expertise with Salesforce CMS, CMS Collections, personalized content strategies, and SLDS compliance.
* Reusable Component Development: Creating modular, maintainable components and frameworks covering triggers, flows, and integrations.
* Security \\& Compliance: Experience with SSO, MFA, secure sharing models, and alignment with ESG/regulatory standards.


**Skills**
 Salesforce Experience Cloud,LWC \\& LWR,Sales Cloud,Salesforce CMS
